metadata.Title: CVE-2021-35949 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The shareinfo controller in the ownCloud Server before 10.8.0 allows an attacker to bypass the permission checks for upload only shares and list metadata about the share.

criterions.comment: owncloud: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
